and.attribute: Senior iOS Developer (800 Usd/month – 1000 Usd/month) job - VietnamWorks
Room 1004, Zen Plaza, 54-56 Nguyen Trai, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

*Job Description - Develop applications and games on Iphone/Ipad for Japanese clients. - Participate in analyzing requirements, designing, implementation, testing and deployment. - Cooperate with other members to investigate new applications based on market demand. - Daily meeting and report to leader * Benefits: - Salary package: highly competitive and negotiable (~ 800 USD/month or more depending on capability) - Language training: Japanese (beginning, intermediate and advanced levels) and English - Applicable for all benefits: insurances, 13th salary, bonus, sport and team building activities - Have chance to develop experience based on current company-owned projects and challenge in pioneering projects of different domains - Have opportunities to go to Japan for training and working based on project's demand - Have chance to be leader in near future - Working in international, professional, innovative and friendly working environment

* Education: University degree in Computer Science, Information Technology or equivalent * Experience: - At least 2 years experience in iOS development - Understand MVC architecture, Agile model - Have strong experience in Objective-C, iOS SDK - Experienced in developing native application independently - Good experience in Cocoa, graphics, UI and layout design is a plus - Having experience in PHP (CakePHP, Zend, etc.), HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Json, and/or Android/Java is a strong plus - Knowing Japanese is a plus * Skills: - Able to read and write English documents - Good sense of teamwork and high responsibility - Good communication skill and problem-solving skill - Self-motivated and self-disciplined (JapanWorks)

DIV.H3: Fabrica Vietnam Room 1004, Zen Plaza, 54-56 Nguyen Trai, District 1, Ho Chi Minh City

DIV.DIV: Contact person: Ms. Thư Company size: 10-24

and.attribute: Website: http://en.www.fabrica-vietnam.com Fabrica Vietnam is a software development outsourcing company with 100% foreign-invested from Fabrica Communications in Japan. Our company focuses on developing and maintaining websites, web applications, mobile applications and system integration for Japanese/Asian market. We aim to be one of major IT-bridges between Japan and Vietnam through turning talent to value in order to provide high-quality systems and services for clients. We offer the professional working environment where you can develop your career and have opportunities to work directly with our Japanese experts and absorb up-to-date technologies. Our company is growing fast and we need talented, dynamic and skillful engineers to contribute to our success. By joining us from now, you will have opportunity to become key persons in our organization. View more More jobs from this employer
